name: Getfugu
tag_list: mobile, augmented-reality, arl, advertising, logo-recognition, voice-activated, image-recognition, voice-recognition, mobile-video-platform, mobile-advertising, scan, barcode, marketing, targeting, targeted-advertising, demographic-profiling, geographic-t
overview:
GetFugu, Inc., a technology company, focuses on developing mobile search tools. Its application enables consumers to retrieve content and eliminate the need to type a Website address or search term into a browser. GetFugu’s products under development include ARL, which recognizes logos and products through mobile phone camera; VRL through which consumer could speak into the phone to retrieve content; GRL designed to work with the GPS systems of mobile phones; and Hotspotting, a mobile ecommerce tool that enables the consumer to purchase or retrieve information featured in the video by touching it on the screen.

The company was formerly known as Madero, Inc. and changed its name to GetFugu, Inc. on March 25, 2009. GetFugu, Inc. was founded in 2007 and is based in San Francisco, California.

milestones.description: Gerfugu Signs Licencing Deal with Gracenote to Provide Music Recognition Consumer Lifestyle Product
milestones.source_text:
WEST HOLLYWOOD, CA--(Marketwire - April 13, 2010) - Getfugu (OTCBB: GFGU), the next generation mobile search tool, today announced it has signed a licensing agreement with GracenoteÂ® to provide music recognition for Getfugu's consumer lifestyle product. 
Using Gracenote's MusicID-Streamâ„¢, the new application enables Getfugu's users to identify music by holding their mobile device to the nearby audio source. In excess of 100 million tracks are available via Gracenote's Global Media Database.
Michael Jay Solomon, CEO of Getfugu, states, "Our aim is to provide our users with an unrivalled mobile experience. Adding Gracenote's technology to our portfolio substantiates the versatility of our product and combined with our feature-rich core product, makes it an irresistible add on. By signing an agreement with Gracenote, we are working with the best in the business and commercially, by utilizing music, we are broadening our consumer base. The obvious consequence of this is yet another compelling reason for advertisers to use our service."
milestones.source_description: Getfugu Tunes in With Gracenote for Music Recognition
